trans-unit.source: Camera which specifies the view and projection transforms as <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> objects
trans-unit.target: 指定的檢視和投影照相機轉換為<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>物件

trans-unit.source: This camera enables applications to calculate their own view and projection matrices.
trans-unit.target: 這個相機可讓應用程式，來計算其自己的檢視和投影矩陣。

trans-unit.source: This allows applications to define cameras not directly supported by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera> subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓應用程式定義不直接支援的數位相機<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera>子類別。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera>

trans-unit.source: Using a MatrixCamera is the only way an application can know what the View/Projection matrices are.
trans-unit.target: 使用 matrixcamera 執行是應用程式可以知道檢視/投影矩陣的唯一方式。

trans-unit.source: A MatrixCamera can be animated using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用動畫 matrixcamera 執行<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"></xref> from view and projection matrices.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"></xref>從檢視和投影矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the camera's view matrix.
trans-unit.target: 指定此相機檢視矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the camera's projection matrix.
trans-unit.target: 指定相機的投影矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> as the projection transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>投影轉換矩陣形式。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful for applications that implement their own projection matrix calculation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是適用於實作自己的投影矩陣計算的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This property transforms the coordinate system from camera space to a normalized cube where the X and Y coordinates range from -1 to 1 and the Z coordinate ranges from zero to 1.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會轉換至其中的 X 和 Y 座標範圍從-1 到 1 和 Z 座標範圍是從 0 到 1 的正規化 cube 從相機空間座標系統。

trans-unit.source: The minimum and maximum Z coordinates in camera space are defined by how the projection matrix transforms the Z coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 相機空間中最小和最大的 Z 座標會定義如何投影矩陣轉換的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that specifies the projection transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>指定的投影轉換。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera.ProjectionMatrix*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera.ProjectionMatrix*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera.ProjectionMatrix*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> as the view transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>檢視轉換矩陣形式。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful for applications that implement their own projection matrix calculation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是適用於實作自己的投影矩陣計算的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The camera properties specified by this matrix might differ from the top-level transform of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定此矩陣的相機屬性可能會與不同的最上層的轉換<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>階層。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>that represents the position, look direction and up vector for the camera.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>表示位置、 尋找方向及向上觀景窗的向量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera.ViewMatrix*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera.ViewMatrix*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixCamera.ViewMatrix*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
